The HexagonalGrid is a class fro generating the hexagonal grid coordinate.

Method Detail

getHexagonalGrid

public static double[][] getHexagonalGrid(double maxChi,
                                          int Nhexagon)
Return the chi, phi angle coordinates for an hexagonal grid coverage up to a given chi angle. Based on Matthies and Wenk paper "On a Hexagonal Grid of Measuring Points for Pole Figure", ???

Parameters:
maxChi - maximum accepted chi angle
Nhexagon - number of "hexagon" divisions for the sphere radius up to 90 degrees in chi.

getChiPhi

public static double[] getChiPhi(double u,
                                 double v,
                                 double Ndiv)
Return the chi, phi angle coordinates for the points u, v as a vector of two double numbers in degrees. See Matthies and Wenk paper "On a Hexagonal Grid of Measuring Points for Pole Figure", ???

Parameters:
u - first hexagonal coordinate
v - second hexagonal coordinate
Ndiv - number of "hexagon" divisions for the sphere radius
